publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Psalms 144
ab.l: David́niń miźmor maḥtavludur H jaratuvčum ol üv́ŕat́uv́č́u qollarymny urušḥa barmaḥlarymny č́eriv́ǵa.
Ševaɣatly Teńrim da b́ek kerḿanim kipligim da juluvču ḿenim da anar išanamyn ol syndyruvču uluslarny t́ub́umd́a.
E H ńe adam ki da eśḱa alasyn any adam uvlu da fikirijni qojasyn anar.
Adam h́eč́likḱa ušejdyr ḱuńĺari ḱoĺaǵa kibik ašadyr.
E H qajyrylɣyn ḱokĺarǵa da eńgiń tijgiń tavlarɣa da t́ut́uńĺańsińĺar.
Jyltrat- ḥyn jyldyrymlarny da tozdurɣun alarny ijgiń oḥlaryjny da bulɣaɣyn alarny.
Ijgiń qudratyjny bijik ḱokt́ań juluɣun da qutḥarɣyn ḿeni ullu suv- lardan qolundan jat eĺniń.
Ki avuzlary alarnyn śoźlejdir jalɣanlyḥny da on qollary toludur jaltajlyḥtan.
E Teńrim šira oḥujum saja janɣy šira on ipli qyǯaḥ byla zemer oḥurmyn saja.
Ol b́e- ŕuv́č́u jarlyɣaš bijĺarǵa ol qutḥaruvču David́ni qulun jaman qylyčtan.
Juluɣun ḿeni da qutḥarɣyn qolundan jat eĺniń ki avuzlary alarnyn śoźlej- dir jalɣanlyḥny da on qollary toludur jaltajlyḥtan.
Ki ulanlarymyz bolgejlar ornatylɣanlar t́eŕakĺar kibik tuǯurulɣanlar jašlyḥla- ryndan qyzlarymyz baɣanalar kibik öśt́uŕuĺǵańĺar t́urśuńu kibik h́eḫalnyn.
Orunlary b́urt́uǵuḿuźńuń ki bolgejlar tolular čyɣa- ruvčular har bir ǯynstan qojlarymyz mińĺangejĺar da t́uḿańĺan- gejĺar oramlarymyzda.
Ullu tuvarlarymyz ki bolgejlar juk tartuvčular bolmagej buzuḥluḥ da bolmagej čyḥmaɣy ǯannyn syjyt oramlarymyzda.
Sandyr bundi ulusḥa ki bolej bolsa anar artyḥ san bolur ol ulusḥa ki H Teńrisi bolsa juvuḥ bolušluɣuna anyn. אַשְרֵי הָעָם שֶכָּכָה לוֹ אַשְרֵי הָעָם שֶיְהֹוָה אֱלֹהָיו ׃
